questions.question: You should NEVER post your personal information, such as cell phone number, address, or the name of your school.
I should write down my passwords and post them where I can easily see them.
questions.result: NO - Passwords should be kept in a secure place and changed every couple of months.

questions.question: Only add people as friends to your social media site if you know them in real life.
Meeting somone in person that I "met" online is okay if my best friend comes with me.
questions.result: NO - If someone wants to meet you in person, immediately tell your parents.

questions.question: Which one is NOT a social media site?
Only download music, movies, and games if they are FREE.
questions.result: NO - Some files may contain viruses.

questions.question: There is a lot of material on the Internet that is inappropriate for children.
I always ask permission from a (__________) before I use the computer, tablet or smartphone.
It's ALWAYS safe to post pictures of yourself on your own social media site, like Facebook or Instagram.
questions.result: NO - It may not be safe to put photographs or any type of personally identifying information on social media sites.  Check with your parents first.
